commit_message:
Optimize undeclared variable checking

To check if a variable has been declared, the linter scans an array
containing about 1000 pointers to strings (for the default global-groups
configuration). Scanning this array is slow.

Use a hash table, improving linting performance significantly. However,
building the hash table is costly:

    Benchmark                                                   Time        Time Old      Time New
    -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    benchmark_undeclared_variable_references_pvalue           0.0002        U Test, Repetitions: 10 vs 10
    benchmark_undeclared_variable_references_mean            -0.9838         2456614         39816
    benchmark_undeclared_variable_references_median          -0.9838         2456636         39821
    benchmark_undeclared_variable_references_stddev          -0.9139            1018            88

    benchmark_lsp_full_text_change_on_tiny_document_pvalue    0.0002        U Test, Repetitions: 10 vs 10
    benchmark_lsp_full_text_change_on_tiny_document_mean     -0.1956            2801          2253
    benchmark_lsp_full_text_change_on_tiny_document_median   -0.1972            2799          2247
    benchmark_lsp_full_text_change_on_tiny_document_stddev   +0.5582               8            12

    benchmark_lsp_full_text_change_on_large_document_pvalue   0.0002        U Test, Repetitions: 10 vs 10
    benchmark_lsp_full_text_change_on_large_document_mean    -0.6277          785976        292599
    benchmark_lsp_full_text_change_on_large_document_median  -0.6274          784239        292204
    benchmark_lsp_full_text_change_on_large_document_stddev  -0.8456           11635          1797

    benchmark_lsp_tiny_change_on_large_document_pvalue        0.0002        U Test, Repetitions: 10 vs 10
    benchmark_lsp_tiny_change_on_large_document_mean         -0.6470          745545        263148
    benchmark_lsp_tiny_change_on_large_document_median       -0.6493          746093        261650
    benchmark_lsp_tiny_change_on_large_document_stddev       -0.5210           10178          4875

    benchmark_parse_config_json/empty_pvalue                  0.0809        U Test, Repetitions: 3 vs 3. WARNING: Results unreliable! 9+ repetitions recommended.
    benchmark_parse_config_json/empty_mean                   +0.3332              89           119
    benchmark_parse_config_json/empty_median                 +0.3325              90           119
    benchmark_parse_config_json/empty_stddev                 -0.3943               0             0

    benchmark_parse_config_json/no_globals_pvalue             0.0809        U Test, Repetitions: 3 vs 3. WARNING: Results unreliable! 9+ repetitions recommended.
    benchmark_parse_config_json/no_globals_mean              +0.3204              97           128
    benchmark_parse_config_json/no_globals_median            +0.3226              97           128
    benchmark_parse_config_json/no_globals_stddev            +0.6638               0             0

    benchmark_parse_config_json/medium_sized_pvalue           0.0809        U Test, Repetitions: 3 vs 3. WARNING: Results unreliable! 9+ repetitions recommended.
    benchmark_parse_config_json/medium_sized_mean            +0.4657             284           416
    benchmark_parse_config_json/medium_sized_median          +0.4647             284           416
    benchmark_parse_config_json/medium_sized_stddev          +5.5776               0             1

    benchmark_config_globals_default_pvalue                   0.0809        U Test, Repetitions: 3 vs 3. WARNING: Results unreliable! 9+ repetitions recommended.
    benchmark_config_globals_default_mean                    +5.6062            8516         56261
    benchmark_config_globals_default_median                  +5.5214            8516         55534
    benchmark_config_globals_default_stddev                +258.6481               5          1296

    benchmark_config_globals_cleared_pvalue                   0.0809        U Test, Repetitions: 3 vs 3. WARNING: Results unreliable! 9+ repetitions recommended.
    benchmark_config_globals_cleared_mean                    +3.7425               6            27
    benchmark_config_globals_cleared_median                  +3.7411               6            27
    benchmark_config_globals_cleared_stddev                  +4.6929               0             0

This commit should not change behavior.
